briefdescription.para: Sets AMD Radeon™ Image Sharpening to enabled or disabled on a GPU.

detaileddescription.para: Sets AMD Radeon™ Image Sharpening to enabled or disabled on a GPU.

entry.para: The new AMD Radeon Image Sharpening state. Set true to enable AMD Radeon Image Sharpening. Set false to disable AMD Radeon Image Sharpening.

detaileddescription.para: If the state of AMD Radeon Image Sharpening is successfully set, ADLX_OK is returned. If the state of AMD Radeon Image Sharpening is not successfully set, an error code is returned. Refer to ADLX_RESULT for success codes and error codes.
AMD Radeon Image Sharpening restores clarity softened by other effects to in-game visuals, and select productivity and media applications.
On some AMD GPUs, AMD Radeon 3D Image Sharpening is mutually exclusive with Radeon Super Resolution.

When AMD Radeon 3D Image Sharpening is enabled, the mutually exclusive features are automatically disabled. If a mutually exclusive feature is re-enabled, its previous configuration settings are restored.
